resources.string: Message from Device Locator installed on device %1$s
Acknowledge that location command was received and send mobile data and GPS status.
GPS information - Accuracy, Latitude, Longitude, Speed, Altitude.
Google maps link with your device current location.
Please wait for a while for response from %1$s. Please retry if no response in 3 minutes.
GPS error. Device %1$s couldn\'t get the location. Please try again!
Can\'t select a contact without Read Contacts permission.
SMS permission is required to receive SMS notifications.
Location permission is required to receive location notifications.
An unexpected error occurred. Crash report has been sent to developer and the issue will be fixed soon!
Notify me when device will move %1$d meters from present location
You\'ll receive notification every time device will move %1$d meters from present location
Please setup Notification settings to receive notification every time device will move %1$d meters from present location
No network connection available! Please connect to networking service and retry.
Authenticate me at application startup using Security PIN

On this screen you can enable SMS commands, manage your Security PIN, and select Location messages sent in reply to Locate command.
Do you want to enable now SMS commands on your device?
<font color="#808080">On this screen you can enable SMS commands, manage your Security PIN, and select Location messages sent in reply to Locate command.</font>

Due to Google Play security policy SMS commands are disabled in this version.
Do you want to download Full version supporting SMS commands?
<font color="#808080">On this screen you can register this device and list other devices registered with the same login. You can click on any device on the list and send command to it.</font>
<font color="#808080">On this screen you can set who should get notified when commands are executed on this device and enable device tracker which will record this device location.</font>
<font color="#808080">You have no registered devices. Do you want to register this device now?</font>
<font color="#808080">On this screen you can grant permissions required to execute commands on this device.</font>

<font color="#808080">You can now send SMS commands to this device. Please note or change pin on Security PIN card and click Permissions button to grant permissions required to execute commands."</font>
<font color="#808080">Telegram id you provided seems to be wrong. Please click OK to find your Telegram id.</font>
<font color="#808080">New Device Locator version is available. Do you want to download it now?</font>
Security PIN must have at least 4 digits! Reverting to previous value…
Only accept commands containing valid Security PIN

%1$s (R)
Version: %2$s-%3$d.%4$s built on %5$s
Copyright © 2010–%6$d GMS World
%7$s installed on %8$s
%9$s
Please grant this permissions to enable failed login notification service and lock screen command in Device Locator.
Device Locator can notify you on failed login, reset your device to factory defaults and lock screen
"Device Locator is tracking your device location. Click to open Device Locator"
In order to activate email notifications please enter 4 digit activation code we\'ve sent to your email address:
In order to activate Telegram notifications please enter 4 digit activation code we\'ve sent to your Telegram chat or channel:
<font color="#808080">It seems you haven\'t any accounts registered on this device. Do you want to register Device Locator account now?</font>
Device Locator is unable to send SMS message due to device error!
Device Locator is unable to send SMS message due to lack of SMS sending permission!
Device Locator is unable to sent notification because your email address is unverified. Please check your inbox for registration message from device-locator@gms-world.net
Oops! Failed to sent email notification. Something went wrong on our side!
Device Locator is unable to sent notification because your chat or channel is unverified! Please register again your Telegram chat or channel.
Oops! Your Telegram chat or channel id seems to be wrong. Please register again your Telegram chat or channel!
Oops! Failed to sent Telegram notification. Something went wrong on our side!
Oops! Something went wrong on our side. Please try again!
If you forgot your Security PIN click here
Security PIN has been sent to notifiers
Please send this email message without modification and we will send you back your Security PIN
Please first install email client on your device and try again!
Please send me back Security PIN from device %1$s.\nRequest id: %2$s
No devices registered! Please make sure to set the same Login above and on all your other registered devices.
This command will reset device to factory defaults and will wipe all data and applications from the device! Are you sure?
Please specify who should get notified in case of failed login
Allow failed device login notification service and Lock screen command
Allow taking front camera photo after failed device login and with Photo command
Allow route tracking service and Location command
Allow receiving SMS commands and sending SMS notifications
Allow taking front camera photo after failed device login and with Photo command
Only accept SMS commands sent from my contacts
Allow to initiate phone call to Call command sender
Allow to list accounts registered on the device
Allow to read device IMEI number for device identification
Allow Reset device to factory defaults command
<font color="#808080">SMS notifications will be sent from this device. This could generate additional costs! Is this OK for you?</font>
<font color="#808080">Do you want to receive notifications to %1$s?</font>
No commands has been sent to this device yet!
Unable to send command to the device %1$s because PIN is not saved!

plurals.name: alarm_interval
plurals.item: Device location will be saved in an interval of %d hour
Device location will be saved in an interval of %d hours
